summary: PURCHASED THE 2005 TRAILBLAZER WITH 49,000 MILES.  AT 50,000 MILES THE SPEEDOMETER STOPPED WORKING PROPERLY.  WHEN I SLOWED DOWN FROM GOING 70 MILES PER HOUR, THE NEEDLE STAYED ON 70 AND WHEN I ACCELERATED IT WOULD ACT AS THOUGH 70 WAS THE NEW 0. NOW THE SPEEDOMETER POINTS DOWN PAST THE 120 MPH MARK AND WILL NOT BUDGE.  GM TOLD ME THAT IT NOT UNDER WARRANTY AND IT WILL COST OVER $500 TO FIX.  *TR
